title: How to Upload Images in BBCode

steps.title: Find an image on your computer that can be embedded into your forum post.
steps.content: Find an image on your computer that can be embedded into your forum post. These directions work with any forum that uses BBCode formatting.

steps.title: If your image is already online, skip to step 3.
steps.content: If your image is already online, skip to step 3. Before you can place your image into your forum post, you need to upload it onto a site like TinyPic or Imgur. Both sites are very simple, and allow for uploading images from a user's computer.

steps.title: Once you have uploaded your image to the Internet, you will need to obtain the direct link to the image.
steps.content: Once you have uploaded your image to the Internet, you will need to obtain the direct link to the image. With tinypic and imgur, this link will appear to the right-hand side of the image.

steps.title: Copy the direct link, and open your forum post.
steps.content: Copy the direct link, and open your forum post. Most forums have a [img] tag button that you can use, if not you can do it manually by typing [IMG]--direct link to your photo here--[/IMG].

steps.title: That's all there is to it.
steps.content: That's all there is to it. For more tips and side notes, refer to the sections below.
